description.value: While all elves are immune to the paralyzing touch of ghouls, you can shake off flesh-numbing magic of all kinds. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against effects that would impose the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed} conditions. When you would be immobilized, paralyzed, or slowed for at least 2 rounds, reduce that duration by 1 round.

rules.label: Against effects that would make you Immobilized, Paralyzed, or Slowed
